title: The True Meaning of Trump’s Tariffs
summary: If US President Donald Trump’s constantly changing trade policies were really about closing economic imbalances or applying market leverage, the recently unveiled tariff schedule would reflect this logic.
fullContent: If US President Donald Trump’s constantly changing trade policies were really about closing economic imbalances or applying market leverage, the recently unveiled tariff schedule would reflect this logic. Instead, the figures make clear that the tariffs are meant to reward geopolitical alignment and punish independence.
